title: What vaccines does my child need and when?
cleaned_text: Call Mental Health Triage on [1800 629 354](tel:1800629354) (free call except from mobiles or public phones) or [6205 1065](tel:62051065) For a poison emergency in Australia call [13 11 26](tel:131126) The Drug and Alcohol Help Line is available 24-hours, 7 days a week on [5124 9977](tel:51249977) For after hours urgent public health matters including environmental health, radiation safety, food poisoning and communicable disease management phone: [02 5124 9700](tel:0251249700) 24 hour health advice [1800 022 222](tel:1800022222) Emergency help during flood or storms
